author: Jeff Stone
title: Amid National Security Warnings, NIST Adds Supply-Chain Security to Cyber Framework
text:
The revised version of the U.S. National Institute of Standards and Technology’s Cybersecurity Framework offers useful lessons for how business leaders can secure their digital supply chain, an area that government officials say is particularly vulnerable to foreign espionage.
U.S. Department of Homeland Security Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen said in a speech Tuesday few firms have the visibility into their own supply chain necessary to address all security vulnerabilities. Ms. Nielsen’s remarks and the NIST update both come...
